Command *tail*
***************

Documentation for the tail command in */trans/cmds/tail.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE:

    |  ``tail <file(s)>``
    |  ``tail -n<number> <files>``

 Prints out the last few lines of a file.
Optional -n flag for number of lines to display (default 10).

.. TAGS: RST
